means: 浸透( saturate的过去式和过去分词)

word_mean: 饱和的：指化学亲和力均已满足
指溶液不能再溶解更多的溶质
表示脂肪酸碳链中仅有单链

sentence.Network_en: As the domestic market becomes saturated, firms begin to export the product.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于国内市场饱和，各公司开始外销。

sentence.Network_en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

sentence.Network_en: The continuous rain had saturated the soil.
sentence.Network_cn: 连绵不断的雨把土地淋了个透。

list.abs: AE中英文对照 ... Hue → 色相位 Saturation → 饱和度 Color → 颜色.
* 全屏抗锯齿(full-screen anti-aliasing(FSAA))* 颜色纠正(color correction)以及各种滤镜(color-shift)特效，包括跳跃漂白(bleach bypass)，过饱和(saturation)，去饱和(de-saturation).对一个游戏引擎来说，拥有一个特效系统来按理所有的粒子，贴花，还有其它特效的特殊渲染是常见的。粒子和贴.

英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... ) satiate v 使充分满足 ) saturate v 使饱和 ) descend v 下降；传下.

entry.def: Saturated fats are types of fat that are found in some foods, especially meat, eggs, and things such as butter and cheese. They are believed to cause heart disease and some other illnesses if eaten too often.

example.ex: ...foods rich in cholesterol and saturated fats.
example.tran: 富含胆固醇和饱和脂肪的食物

means.word_mean: 1. being the most concentrated solution possible at a given temperature; unable to dissolve still more of a substance;
2. wet through and through; thoroughly wet;

sentences.sentence: "stood at the door drenched (or soaked) by the rain"

means.word_mean: 3. used especially of organic compounds; having all available valence bonds filled;
4. (of color) being chromatically pure; not diluted with white or gray or black

stems_affixes.value_cn: 渗透的, 饱和的, 深颜色的
stems_affixes.word_buile: saturate使充满,使饱和+ed……的→adj.渗透的, 饱和的, 深颜色的
saturate使充满,使饱和+ion表名词→n.饱和[状态];浸透

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使湿透,浸透;使充满,使饱和
stems_affixes.word_buile: satur足够,饱足+ate使……→使足够→饱和
